level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: In applying and construing this chapter, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-137 rewrote the section which had read as follows: "This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting it."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-81
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 46-301.01.

level.heading: Effective Dates
level.text: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: "This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007."

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 901 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
